pivot.wtk
Class TablePane

java.lang.Object
  pivot.wtk.Component
      pivot.wtk.Container
          pivot.wtk.TablePane
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<Component>, Sequence<Component>, ConstrainedVisual, Visual
public class TablePane
extends Container

Container that arranges components in a two-dimensional grid, optionally spanning multiple rows and columns.

Author:
tvolkert
